Title: Taisei Kensetsu: Sri Lanka Kousokudouro
Description: ['A 30-second animated commercial for the construction company Taisei. The commercial highlights the Southern and Outer Circular Expressways that Taisei built in Sri Lanka.']
Staff: [['Shinkai, Makoto', 'Director, Storyboard'], ['Tenmon', 'Music'], ['Urbanowicz, Mateusz', 'Background Art'], ['Tanji, Takumi', 'Background Art']]
